Order
A simple model class representing an Order with a orderID, userID, OrganisationID, Order datetime, amount and billingaddress.
OrderDAO
Data Access Object class for managing Order objects in the database.
OrgAccountPageController
 
Organisation
A simple model class representing an Organisation with an id, name, description, imgpath, email, groupsupported, username and password.
OrganisationAnswers
A simple model class representing an Organisations answers to the registration quiz with an organisationId, category, size, donationOptions, taxableCategory and donordpecifies.

Data Access Object class for managing OrganisationAnswer objects in the database.

Data Access Object class for managing Organisation objects in the database.

A simple model class representing a Users answers with a userId, category, size, donationoptions, taxablecategory and donorspecifies.
